summary: Let you claim Anise\'s Cabin as your home after you kill its previous owner.
descriptionHtml:
[SPOILER]
Southwest of Riverwood lies Anise\'s Cabin, home of an old women named well.. Anise.  There\'s a trapdoor next to her bed who lead to a secret cellar.  You can find a note on a table that reveals Anise\'s greatest secret...

What my mod do is to remove the ownership on every items inside both the house and the cellar after Anise is killed.  So wait after her death before you take anything because it won\'t count as stealing anymore!   While you have to kill her to actually own the house, it\'s still fine for people who wish to role-play a non-evil character because she will atack you as soon as you exit the cellar.  

There is two version to choose from : 

Alchemist\'s Cabin
The cellar contain an Arcane Enchanter and an Alchemy Lab as well as some more potions and ingredients.  You will also find the Alchemy skill book \"Song of the Alchemists\" on a shelf inside the house.  

Assassin\'s Cabin
The cellar contain an Alchemy Lab, a prison cell (Who contain a dead prisoner) as well as some more potions and ingredients.  You will also find the Sneak skill book \"Legend of Krately House\" on a shelf inside the house.  

Extract the esp to \"...Skyrim\\Data\\\" Folder
In the data files section in Skyrim launcher, Tick the box \"Alchemist\'s Cabin.esp\".

If you like the mod don\'t forget to endorse the file and leave a comment, its always appreciate!  If you find any bug, just let me know!
author: Indigo
